org.sql: SELECT DISTINCT users.* FROM users INNER JOIN email_addresses ON email_addresses.user_id = users.id WHERE users.type IN ('User', 'AnonymousUser') AND users.status = "$1" AND LOWER(email_addresses.address) IN ('redmine@somenet.foo')

rewrites.sql: SELECT users.* FROM users INNER JOIN email_addresses ON email_addresses.user_id = users.id WHERE users.type IN ('User', 'AnonymousUser') AND users.status = "$1" AND LOWER(email_addresses.address) IN ('redmine@somenet.foo')

SELECT users.* FROM users INNER JOIN email_addresses ON email_addresses.user_id = users.id WHERE users.type IN ('User', 'AnonymousUser') AND users.status = "$1" AND LOWER(email_addresses.address) IN ('redmine@somenet.foo') LIMIT 1
